Verses: 1 jaadhigale, Ketkiradharkuk Kittivaarungal; Janangale Gavaniyungal; Boomiyum Adhin Niraivum, Poochchakkaramum Adhil Urpaththiyaana Yaavum Ketkakkadavadhu.
2 sagala Jaadhigalinmelum Karththarudaiya Kadunkobamum, Avargaludaiya Sagala Senaigalinmelum Avarudaiya Ukkiramum Moolugiradhu; Avargalai Sangaaraththukku Niyamiththu, Kolaikku Oppukkodukkiraar.
3 avargalile Kolaiseyyappattavargal Veliye Eriyundukidappaargal; Avargaludaiya Predhangal Naatramedukkum; Avargaludaiya Raththaththinaale Malaigalum Karaindhupom.

4 vaanaththin Sarvasenaiyum Karaindhu, Vaanangal Pusthagachchurulaippol Suruttappattu, Avaigalin Sarvasenaiyum Dhraatchachchediyin Ilaigal Udhirugiradhupolavum, Aththimaraththin Kaaigal Udhirugiradhupolavum Udhirndhu Vizhum.
5 vaanangalil En Pattayam Verikondadhu; Idho Edhominmelum, Naan Sangaaraththukku Niyamiththa Janaththin Melum, Adhu Nyaayancheyya Irangum.

6 posraavile Karththarukku Oru Yaagamum, Edhom Dhesaththile Magaasangaaramum Undu; Karththarudaiya Pattayam Raththaththaal Thirupthiyaagi, Ninaththinaal Poorikkindradhu; Aattukkuttigal Kadaakkaludaiya Raththaththinaalum, Aattukkadaakkaludaiya Kundikkaaigalin Kozhuppinaalum Thirupthiyaagum.
7 avaigalode Kaandaamirugangalum, Rishabangalode Kaalaigalum Vandhu Madiyum, Avargal Dhesam Raththaverikondu Avargal Man Ninaththinaal Kozhuththuppom.
8 adhu Karththar Pazhivaangum Naal, Seeyonudaiya Vazhakkinimiththam Padhilalikkum Varusham.
9 adhin Aarugal Pisinaagavum, Adhin Man Kandhagamaagavum Maari, Adhin Nilam Erigira Keelaaippom.
10 iravum Pagalum Adhu Aviyaadhu; Adhin Pugai Endrendraikkum Ezhumbum; Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Adhu Paazhaayirukkum, Sadhaakaalam Sadhaakaalamaaga Adhai Oruvarum Kadandhupovadhillai.
11 naaraiyum Mullampandriyum Adhai Sudhandharikkum, Aandhaiyum Kaakkaiyum Adhile Kudiyirukkum; Adhinmel Vettaveliyin Noolaiyum, Verumaiyin Thookkaiyum Pidippaar.
12 raajyabaarampannina Adhin Menmakkalai Azhaiththaal, Ange Avargalil Oruvarum Iraargal; Adhin Prabukkal Anaivarum Illaamarpovaargal.
13 adhin Aramanaigalil Mutchedigalum, Adhin Kottaigalil Kaanjorigalum Mutpoondugalum Mulaikkum; Adhu Valusarppangalin Thaabaramum, Kottaangalin Maaligaiyumaayirukkum.
14 ange Kaattumirugangalum Origalum Ondraiyondru Sandhiththu Kaattaattaik Kaattaadu Kooppidum; Ange Saakkuruvigalum Thangi, Ilaippaarum Idaththaik Kandadaiyum.
15 ange Valloorum Koodukatti, Muttaiyittu, Kunjuporiththu, Avaigalaith Than Nizhalile Koottikkollum; Ange Kooligalum Jodujodaaga Serum.
16 karththarudaiya Pusthagaththilethedi Vaasiyungal; Ivaigalil Ondrum Kuraiyaadhu; Ivaigalil Ondrum Jodillaadhiraadhu; Avarudaiya Vaai Idhai Sollitru; Avarudaiya Aavi Avaigalai Serkkum.

17 avare Avaigalukku Seettuppottaar; Avarudaiya Kaiye Adhai Avaigalukku Alavunoolaal Pagirndhu Koduththadhu; Avaigal Endraikkum Adhai Sudhandhariththuth Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Adhile Sanjarikkum.
